resources.string: Tech Cafe is a platform where you can learn and improve your skills within a specific computer science field. Using this app will give you the chance to view statistics, common interview questions and practice problems for your chosen field. Sign up or Log in to get started!
\tI have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions

Software development refers to a set of computer science activities dedicated to the process of creating, designing, deploying, and supporting software. Software development can lead to careers in programming, software engineering, and software focussed development. Software development is important because it links and provides new perspectives in the ever-changing world.

Cybersecurity is the practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks. It refers to the body of technologies, processes, and practices designed to protect networks, devices, programs, and data from attack, damage, or unauthorized access. Cybersecurity is important because organizations collect, process, and store unprecedented amounts of data on computers and other devices.

UI/UX designing focuses on U - user. The UI aspect focuses on the “user interface” which is essentially the layout of an application. UX focuses on “user experience.” UX works with UI to determine the structure of the interface and the functionality.
